a.title:
If you have a child who will be five-years-old by August 1, 2020, then April is the time to get him/her registered for kindergarten for the coming school year. Kindergarten registration begins Mon., May 4 and runs through June 5.

We've made the registering as easy as 1, 2, 3, using SpeedyStart, our online enrollment system. Visit our Enrollment page to start the online enrollment process. Feel free to contact one of our enrollment specialists at 614-491-8288 should you have questions.

We're looking forward to having your child become part of the Cruiser family! Location: Enrollment Center, District Service Center, 4400 Marketing Pl., Suite B, Groveport, OH 43125
